name: La Strada
description: La Strada earned a spot on Food Network's 2019 list of the Best Pastas in the Country for its signature Mushroom Ravioli. In addition to multiple Best of Reno awards, La Strada has won the Wine Spectator Award of Excellence for nine consecutive years. Experience the taste and romance of Italy at the Eldorado's signature Italian restaurant.
shortDescription: Food Network-recognized Italian fine dining with nine-time Wine Spectator Award of Excellence.

faqs.question: What is La Strada known for?
faqs.answer: Their signature Mushroom Ravioli, recognized by Food Network as one of the best pastas in America.

faqs.question: Is there a dress code?
faqs.answer: Yes, appropriate dress is required. No sleeveless shirts for gentlemen.

faqs.question: Does La Strada have a wine program?
faqs.answer: Yes, they've won the Wine Spectator Award of Excellence for nine consecutive years.

meta.title: La Strada – Food Network-Acclaimed Italian at Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Savor Food Network-recognized Mushroom Ravioli and Italian fine dining at La Strada in Eldorado Resort, downtown Reno.

testimonials.quote: Golf the High Sierra arranged our group dinner at La Strada and it was a highlight of the trip. Great atmosphere, excellent food, and they accommodated all our dietary needs.
testimonials.author: Jeff M.

testimonials.quote: La Strada was the perfect post-golf dinner spot. The menu had something for everyone in our group. eldorado-resorts-reno-eldorado-at-the-row is lucky to have this on-site.
testimonials.author: Paul L.
